Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.cli.logging

[Java] Class GrailsConsoleErrorPrintStream

          • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.cli.logging.GrailsConsoleErrorPrintStream

          • Used to replace default System.err with one that routes calls through GrailsConsole.

            Authors:
            Graeme Rocher

            2.0
